## 1Ô∏è‚É£ **Section 1: Start & Input**

* **üö¶ Start Workflow (Manual Trigger)**

  * *Node: When clicking ‚ÄòExecute workflow‚Äô*
  * **What happens:**
    You begin the automation by clicking the "Execute workflow" button in n8n. This makes the process fully manual and secure‚Äîyou decide when to run it.

* **üîó Enter Forum URL**

  * *Node: Edit Fields (manual)*
  * **What happens:**
    You paste the URL of the specific Superuser Q\&A forum post you want to analyze. No coding or technical setup‚Äîjust copy and paste!

**üü¢ Why this is great for beginners:**
You only need to provide the link and click a button. No scripts, no complex setup.

## 3Ô∏è‚É£ **Section 3: Share Insights with Your Team**

* **‚úâÔ∏è Send Insights to Product Team**

  * *Node: Gmail (send: message)*
  * **What happens:**
    The final, cleaned, and structured insights are sent as an email to your Product Team. This means the right people get the right information at the right time‚Äîautomatically.

**üü¢ Why this is great for beginners:**
No more compiling or sending emails yourself! The system takes care of communicating findings‚Äîsaving time and ensuring nothing is forgotten.

## 2Ô∏è‚É£ **Section 2: AI Agent Scrapes & Analyzes**

* **ü§ñ Agent: Extract Forum Insights**

  * *Node: AI Agent*

  This is where all the magic happens! The AI agent coordinates a team of tools to read the forum post, pick out the most important details, and structure everything perfectly.

  **Sub-nodes powering the agent:**

  * **üß† Chat Model Reasoning**
    *Node: OpenAI Chat Model*
    ‚Äî Understands what you want and plans the scraping/analysis logic.
  * **üåê Web Scraper Tool (scrape\_as\_markdown)**
    *Node: MCP Client (executeTool)*
    ‚Äî Securely visits the forum page and fetches the Q\&A content in a readable format.
  * **üì¶ Format Forum Data as JSON**
    *Node: Structured Output Parser*
    ‚Äî Transforms messy forum data into a well-structured JSON object including:

    * Platform name
    * Author name
    * Question
    * Answer snippet
    * Link
    * **Identified customer pain points!**

**üü¢ Why this is great for beginners:**
You don‚Äôt have to read, sort, or copy any forum data. The agent does everything: reading, understanding, summarizing, and structuring‚Äîjust like a human analyst, but automated!
